metadata.name: Arthur Vilar Surfboard (Series 1) #0001
metadata.description: Inspired by his father, former competitive surfer Arthur de Souto, the 11-year-old prodigy strives to carry on his legacy. Taken under Olympic champion Ítalo Ferreira’s wing, the little legend has swept awards in the Under 8, 10, and 12 categories. Arthur Vilar continues to ride the glory of youth by learning new maneuvers to help him claim his brilliant victory. To celebrate this exciting partnership, RAXworld is releasing 1,000 mystery boxes on the 3rd of April 2023. This series of surfboard provides special perks and abilities in the RAXworld's destination - The Arena. It also provides exclusive experiences and benefits in its greater ecosystem.
